message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly exceptional. I believe its value goes beyond mere monetary terms, but I understand everyone has their own valuation. To start, I am offering it at $15000. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value you place on the product, I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Considering my budget and the current market conditions, I would like to propose a price of $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding your position. In light of our discussion, I would like to adjust my offer to $12500. This reflects a compromise between our respective positions, while still acknowledging the value I place on the product. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $11000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
